author: Kathleen Foody, Amy Forliti and Geir Moulson / AP
title: U.S. COVID-19 Death Toll Tops Italy’s as the Midwest Braces for Potential Surge
description: The U.S. death toll from the coronavirus eclipsed Italy's for the highest in the world Saturday at about 20,000.
content: (CHICAGO) — The U.S. death toll from the coronavirus eclipsed Italy’s for the highest in the world Saturday at about 20,000, as Chicago and other cities across the Midwest braced for a potential surge in victims and moved to snuff out smoldering hot spots of … [+6218 chars]
